awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: Based on the true story of a small-town Indiana team that made the state finals in 1954, this movie chronicles the attempts of a coach with a spotty past, and the town's basketball-loving drunk to lead their high school team to victory.
plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.
title: Hoosiers
